name: LAVALHALLA
description:
Who will be the best in the lava arena?
Welcome to LAVALHALLA ! Keep the Spark's Core to stay alive while repelling your opponent !

Push yourself and your mindgames to the limits in this fast-paced platform fighter !

The game is based on 3 main mechanics : You can Jump, Dash or Shoot the Core.

  • Your health will decrease if you don’t touch the core
  • Try to take it and keep it away from your opponent
  • Use the core as a weapon by shooting it at your opponent
  • When not carrying it, you’re swiftlier and can dash around
  • Be careful not to get hit by a dash, or you'll lose the core and suffer damage
  • You’re only vulnerable when you hold the core
  • Make good use of the environment to bounche the core back at yourself, turning invulnerable in the meantime

Genre : Plateform Fighter

  • Number of players : 2 local
  • Development time : 1 month
  • Platform : Windows & Mac

Controller required !

  • Left and Right back buttons and A to Jump
  • Left joystick to Move around in 2D
  • Right joystick to Dash if you don't have the core
  • Right joystick to the Shoot the core if you’re holding it

Side notes : PS & XBOX Controller supported, does not work with Pro Controller from Nintendo

  • UX & UR : Alexandre "DLSKQ" Crespel
  • Project Manager : Guillaume "Kaïton" Angeli
  1. Download the game
  2. Extract it
  3. Execute Lavalhalla.exe
  4. Play locally or via Parsec
  5. Have fun !
